issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Label overlaps the table view on changing orientation.
This is not regression. This issue occurs since 1.8.2

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch KitchenSink.
2. Go to Kitchensink > BaseUI> Views> TableViews> Composite (partial size).
3. Rotate the device.

Actual:
Label(Tableviews are cool) overlaps the tableview.

Expected:
Label should not overlap the tableview.
fields.summary: iOS: TableViews - Label overlaps the table view on changing orientation.
fields.environment:
Tested with SDK: 2.1.0.v20120613210250
Tested with Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206121914
Device: iPhone 3GS (v 5.0.1), iPhone simulator
OS: Mac OSX Version 10.7.3

comments.body:
Issue reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
